name: Dice Organizer
description:
A Game about finding scattered dices. 

This Game was created under 48 hours for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam

The theme of the Jam was "Roll of the Dice".

The Idea for this game came to me when I was rolling dice around thinking about possible game Ideas, then I realize that trying to find a die amidst the chaos was pretty fun. 

The fact that the idea was also simple help, since this is my first game on the Unity Engine.
